issue.title: [C++][Python] Implement ExtensionScalar
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13541](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13541). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, ExtensionScalar is just an empty shell around the base Scalar class.
It should have a ValueType member, and support the various usual operations (hashing, equality, validation, GetScalar, etc.).
